objenome.solver.evolve.event

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.evolve.event.EventManager
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventManager class provides event-related functionality. It is a singleton, which is obtainable with the getInstance method. It provides methods for registering listeners and firing events.

    Note: The current implementation is not thread-safe.

    See Also:
    Listener, TODO use EventEmitter

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public <T extends Event> void add(java.lang.Class<? extends T> key,
                                  Listener<T> listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Registers a listener for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        key - the class of the event.
        listener - the listener object.

      • remove

        public <T extends Event> boolean remove(java.lang.Class<? extends T> key,
                                        Listener<T> listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes a listener from the specified event. This effectively makes the listener stop receiveing notifications of the event.
        Parameters:
        key - the class of the event.
        listener - the listener object.
        Returns:
        true if the event's listener mapping contained the specified listener.

      • fire

        public <T extends Event,V extends T> void fire(T event)
        Deprecated. 
        Fires the specified event by notifying all registered listeners.
        Parameters:
        event - the event object.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Deprecated. 
        Removes all events listener mapping. The EventManager will be empty this call returns.
